oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dr. Emma Rochelle Wheeler and nurses at Walden Hospital
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Achieving Recognition
Medical profession
African American nurses; African American physicians; Women physicians; African American women
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A group of uniformed African American women stands outside a two-story building.

Dr. Emma Rochelle Wheeler, a graduate of Meharry Medical College, founded Walden Hospital in Chattanooga. The building still stands today near the campus of the University of Tennessee at Chattanooga.
